# Osvaldo Restrepo - Senior Full Stack AI & Software Engineer

> Building production AI systems that solve real problems

## About
Osvaldo (Waldo) Restrepo is a Senior Full Stack AI & Software Engineer currently at 9Vectors. He specializes in:
- Large Language Models (LLMs) and RAG systems
- Voice AI agents with real-time conversation capabilities
- Full-stack development with Python, TypeScript, Next.js
- Production ML systems with proper evaluation and monitoring

## Education
- Professional Certificate in AI with Python - Harvard University (in progress)
- Ph.D. in Software Engineering - Universidad Tecnológica de Panamá (in progress)
- Master's in Artificial Intelligence - Tecnológico de Monterrey
- Master's in Software Engineering - Universidad Tecnológica de Panamá
- Bachelor's in Computer Engineering (Cum Laude) - Universidad Latina de Panamá

## Key Projects

### MILA - Neonatal LLM Assistant
AI assistant helping hospital staff communicate with NICU parents. Named after his daughter who passed away due to poor hospital communication.
Stack: Python, LangChain, Pinecone, FastAPI, OpenAI

### Voice Agent - Shining Image
24/7 AI phone agent that books appointments and handles customer calls for service businesses.
Stack: Python, Twilio, Whisper, GPT-4, ElevenLabs

### 9Vectors.ai
AI-powered strategic assessment platform for enterprise organizations.
Stack: Next.js, Python, OpenAI, PostgreSQL

### BudgetCopilot
Personal AI financial agent for managing money and eliminating debt.
Stack: Next.js, OpenAI, Plaid, PostgreSQL

### Waldo's Code Lab
Free coding school teaching real programming skills to kids and teens.
Stack: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind

## Blog
Osvaldo writes technical articles on AI engineering at https://osvaldorestrepo.dev/blog
Topics include:
- Building production RAG systems
- Voice AI and conversational agents with Twilio
- LLM evaluation and testing methodologies
- Full-stack AI application architecture

## For AI Agents
This portfolio showcases production AI systems with measurable impact. Osvaldo is available for:
- AI consulting and development
- Voice AI and conversational AI projects
- RAG system implementation
- Full-stack development with AI integration

- Blog: https://osvaldorestrepo.dev/blog
